group.name: locator
group.description: Define parameters of the locator. Only LOCSAT is supported.

parameter.name: profile
parameter.description: The locator profile to use.

parameter.name: defaultDepth
parameter.description: For each location, scautoloc performs checks to test if the depth estimate is reliable. If the same location quality (e.g. pick RMS) can be achieved while fixing the depth to the default depth, the latter is used. This is most often the case for shallow events with essentially no depth resolution.

parameter.name: minimumDepth
parameter.description:
The locator might converge at a depth of 0 or even negative depths. This is usually not desired, as 0 km might be interpreted as indicative of e.g. a quarry blast or another explosive source. In the case of "too shallow" locations the minimum depth will be used.
Note that the minimum depth can also be configured in scolv, possibly to a different value.

parameter.name: pickKeep
parameter.description: Time to keep picks in the buffer with respect to pick time, not creation time.

parameter.name: originKeep
parameter.description: Time to keep origins in buffer.

parameter.name: cleanupInterval
parameter.description: Clean-up interval for removing old/unused objects.

group.name: autoloc
group.description: Define parameters for creating and reporting origins.

parameter.name: maxRMS
parameter.description: Maximum travel-time RMS for a location to be reported.

parameter.name: maxResidual
parameter.description: Maximum travel-time residual (unweighted) for a pick at a station to be used.

parameter.name: minPhaseCount
parameter.description: Minimum number of phases for reporting origins.

parameter.name: maxDepth
parameter.description: Maximum permissible depth for reporting origins.

parameter.name: maxSGAP
parameter.description:
Maximum secondary azimuthal gap for an origin to be reported by. The secondary gap is the maximum of the sum of 2 station gaps.
Default: 360 degrees, i.e. no restriction based on this parameter.

parameter.name: maxStationDistance
parameter.description: Maximum epicntral distance to stations for accepting picks.

parameter.name: minStaCountIgnorePKP
parameter.description: If the station count for stations at < 105 degrees distance exceeds this number, no picks at > 105 degrees will be used in location. They will be loosely associated, though.

parameter.name: amplTypeAbs
parameter.description: If this string is non-empty, an amplitude obtained from an amplitude object is used by ... . If this string is "mb", a period obtained from the amplitude object is also used; if it has some other value, then 1 [units?] is used. If this string is empty, then the amplitude is set to 0.5 * thresholdXXL, and 1 [units?] is used for the period.

parameter.name: amplTypeSNR
parameter.description: If this string is non-empty, it is used to obtain a pick SNR from an amplitude object. If it is empty, the pick SNR is 10.

parameter.name: grid
parameter.description: Location of the grid file for nucleating origins.

parameter.name: stationConfig
parameter.description: Location of the station configuration file for nucleating origins.

parameter.name: stationLocations
parameter.description: The station file to be used when in offline mode. If no file is given the database is used. An example is given in "@DATADIR@/scautoloc/station-locations.conf".

parameter.name: useManualPicks
parameter.description: Receive and process manual phase picks.

parameter.name: useManualOrigins
parameter.description:
Receive and process manual origins. Manual picks and arrival weights will be adopted from the manual origin and the processing continues with these. Origins produced this way by adding incoming automatic picks are nevertheless marked as automatic origins. But they may contain manual picks (even pP and S picks).
Add the LOCATION group to connection.subscriptions for receiving manual origins!
This is an experimental feature relevant only for large regional and global networks, where results by analysts can be expected before the end of automatic event processing.

parameter.name: adoptManualDepth
parameter.description: Adopt the depth from manual origins. Otherwise the default depth in locator.defaultDepth is considered.

parameter.name: authors
parameter.description: Restrict pick processing to the given author name(s). Apply comma separation for a list of names. If any author name is given, picks from other authors are ignored.

parameter.name: tryDefaultDepth
parameter.description: Compare located origin with the origin at the depth given by locator.defaultDepth. The origin with lower RMS is reported.

parameter.name: publicationIntervalTimeSlope
parameter.description: Parameter "a" in the equation t = aN + b. t is the time interval between sending updates of an origin. N is the arrival count of the origin.

parameter.name: publicationIntervalTimeIntercept
parameter.description: Parameter "b" in the equation t = aN + b. t is the time interval between sending updates of an origin. N is the arrival count of the origin.

parameter.name: pickLogEnable
parameter.description: Activate for writing pick log files to "pickLog".

parameter.name: pickLog
parameter.description: Location of pick log file containing information about received picks. Activate "pickLogEnable" for writing the files.

group.name: xxl
group.description: Create origins from XXL picks. These origins will receive the status "preliminary". Use with care! Enabling XXL picks may result in frequent fake solutions.

parameter.name: enable
parameter.description:
Picks with exceptionally large amplitudes may be flagged as XXL, allowing (in future) faster, preliminary "heads-up" alerts.
This option enables the feature.

parameter.name: minAmplitude
parameter.description: Minimum amplitude for a pick to be flagged as XXL. The value corresponds to the amplitude type configured in autoloc.amplTypeAbs. NOTE that BOTH minAmplitude and minSNR need to be exceeded!

parameter.name: minSNR
parameter.description: Minimum SNR for a pick to be flagged as XXL. NOTE that BOTH minAmplitude and minSNR need to be exceeded!

parameter.name: minPhaseCount
parameter.description: Minimum number of XXL picks for forming an origin. Must be >= 4.

parameter.name: maxStationDistance
parameter.description: Maximum epicentral distance for accepting XXL picks.

parameter.name: maxDepth
parameter.description: Maximum depth for creating origins based on XXL arrivals.
